heading: Very positive
text: Global cooperation is gaining momentum, with scientific breakthroughs, expanding access to education, and renewed diplomatic efforts steadily improving quality of life across regions.

heading: Mostly positive
text: While challenges persist, innovation in energy, medicine, and connectivity continues to lift millions, and international collaboration is showing real, if uneven, progress.

heading: Mixed
text: The world stands at a crossroads, balancing remarkable technological and social advances against persistent inequality, political friction, and environmental strain.

heading: Somewhat negative
text: Economic uncertainty, regional conflicts, and climate pressures are testing institutions and public trust, slowing progress and widening divides.

heading: Negative
text: Rising polarization, fragile supply chains, and uneven recovery are eroding stability, leaving many communities vulnerable to shocks.

heading: Very negative
text: Escalating conflicts, democratic backsliding, and accelerating climate impacts are overwhelming systems meant to protect people and planet.

heading: Extremely negative
text: A convergence of war, ecological collapse, economic breakdown, and institutional failure is pushing the global order toward a dangerous unraveling.
